title: The Adventures of Kid Combat Volume Three: Jones Strikes Back
description: Kid Combat is back for its third exciting volume!Jones returns to Elmcrest - more determined than ever to find out who Kid Combat is. After throwing himself a lavish parade down Main Street, Jones starts plotting with a certain rouge boy to bring down Kid Combat and his friends.The third volume of this series is presented in a special ebook version! Check out kidcombat.com for more.
author: Christopher Helwink
